quests.name: Into the West Wing!
objectives: Explore the Beauty and the Beast Realm.
Follow the flying book.
Talk to Belle.
Catch the 5 flying books in the library.
Bring every Flying Book to Belle.
Find a way to get into the secret passage in the library.
Talk to Belle.

Gather the following materials throughout the Beauty and the Beast Realm:
  ‧ 4 Castle Candle.
  ‧ 1 Castle Candle Holder.
  ‧ 1 Golden Curtain.
Bring what you've gathered to Belle.
Put on the Candle Hat.
Put on the Candlestick Disguise.
Pass through the curtain in the secret passage to get to the West Wing.
Talk to The Beast.
Talk to Belle.
Talk to Merlin in the Village.
Craft an Enchanted Canvas.
Bring the Enchanted Canvas to Belle in the Beauty and the Beast Realm.
Follow Belle into the West Wing.
Talk to Belle in the West Wing.
Talk to The Beast in the West Wing.
Talk to Belle.
